name: download-ncbi-data
description: download specific data from NCBI's FTP site
usage: download-ncbi-data pmc-oa | pmc-bioc | bioconcepts | generif | meshtree | taxname | journals | oa-list | oa-book | carotene

subcommands.name: pmc-oa
subcommands.description: Download PubMed Central open-access archives in traditional format, unless already present.

subcommands.name: pmc-bioc
subcommands.description: Download PubMed Central open-access archives in BioConcepts format, unless already present.

subcommands.name: bioconcepts
subcommands.description: Download the BioConcepts/PubTatorCentral mapping bioconcepts2pubtatorcentral.gz, unless already present.

subcommands.name: meshtree
subcommands.description: Download MeSH data and extract some summaries.

subcommands.name: oa-list
subcommands.description: Download PubMed Central open-access archives in traditional format, unless already present.

subcommands.name: oa-book
subcommands.description: Download PubMed Central open-access archives in BioConcepts format, unless already present.

subcommands.name: carotene
subcommands.description: Download and unzip sample XML for carotene.
